Class ServerProxy

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera.network.client.ServerProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualServer, Remote
public class ServerProxy extends Object implements VirtualServer
Represents a proxy for interacting with a server via output streams.
